title: Obscure errors with React in Webpack Generated Static Site
body:
Spent a lot of time battling against these two errors today. The project setup is kinda complicated, but I'm trying to put together a minimal working example. That said, I'm not trying to do anything weird, just a generated webpack bundle that requires React and ReactDOM with [static-site-generator-webpack-plugin](https://github.com/markdalgleish/static-site-generator-webpack-plugin).

In the meantime, I wanted to put this out there to check whether anyone knows of possible reasons for these obscure errors:

If I import ReactDOM before importing React:

```
Uncaught Error: ReactUpdates: must inject a reconcile transaction class and batching strategy
    at invariant (invariant.js:44)
    at ensureInjected (ReactUpdates.js:32)
    at Object.batchedUpdates (ReactUpdates.js:96)
    at Object._renderNewRootComponent (ReactMount.js:320)
    at Object._renderSubtreeIntoContainer (ReactMount.js:401)
    at Object.render (ReactMount.js:422)
    at Object.<anonymous> (index.js:6)
    at __webpack_require__ (bootstrap 5c3c713…:19)
    at bootstrap 5c3c713…:39
    at bootstrap 5c3c713…:39
invariant @ invariant.js:44
ensureInjected @ ReactUpdates.js:32
batchedUpdates @ ReactUpdates.js:96
_renderNewRootComponent @ ReactMount.js:320
_renderSubtreeIntoContainer @ ReactMount.js:401
render @ ReactMount.js:422
(anonymous) @ index.js:6
__webpack_require__ @ bootstrap 5c3c713…:19
(anonymous) @ bootstrap 5c3c713…:39
(anonymous) @ bootstrap 5c3c713…:39
webpackUniversalModuleDefinition @ universalModuleDefinition:7
(anonymous) @ universalModuleDefinition:10
```

If I import React before ReactDOM:

```
Uncaught Error: There is no registered component for the tag div
    at invariant (invariant.js:44)
    at Object.createInternalComponent (ReactHostComponent.js:40)
    at ReactCompositeComponentWrapper.instantiateReactComponent [as _instantiateReactComponent] (instantiateReactComponent.js:82)
    at ReactCompositeComponentWrapper.performInitialMount (ReactCompositeComponent.js:367)
    at ReactCompositeComponentWrapper.mountComponent (ReactCompositeComponent.js:258)
    at Object.mountComponent (ReactReconciler.js:46)
    at ReactCompositeComponentWrapper.performInitialMount (ReactCompositeComponent.js:371)
    at ReactCompositeComponentWrapper.mountComponent (ReactCompositeComponent.js:258)
    at Object.mountComponent (ReactReconciler.js:46)
    at mountComponentIntoNode (ReactMount.js:104)
```
